item.title: ctfs && recon
item.description: We’ll get started at 13:05 week01 what is a ctf && recon disclaimer many of the tools and techniques discussed in these sessions could be used against real websites/applications this is quite acknowledgement of country We begin by acknowledging the Traditional Custodians of the land on which we meet, and pay our respects to their Elders past and present. We extend that arespect to Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples here today.

item.title: Week02
item.description: We’ll get started at ??:05 Week02 T12A COMP1234 Client-side injection HTML Injection XSS CSRF HTML injection HTML injection Browsers just render the DOM How would it know if tags are user-supplied or server-supplied what if our input was just <s>? Know your tags Some are paired <div></div> Some aren’t <img src=.../> what goes in here? <script>...</script> XSS Cross-site scripting another ‘mixing of data and control’ issue Tricking a browser into executing your code javascript, php, py-script?
